__e: And I hope that you know just how much you did for me.
And I think we both know that I have you to thank for that, so I-I... wanted to give you a little something.
Oh, I should never know how much I owe you, my dear mother, if Rose didn't choose to enlighten me now and then.
Thanks to people like you, you don't need a partner.
- He led us to the other four victims. - Katrine, no.
But to be perfectly honest, I think the girls deserve most of the credit.
I'm only here tonight because of you.
Thanks to her, I got rid of my wife, so I'll always be grateful.

Well, we have the doctor to thank for finding you.
We're here all because of your wife...
Thanks to you, There won't be any more.
- You know, it's 'cause of you they're here.
